Docs.summary: A Class representing an IotHubDescription along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct an from an instance of using the GetIotHubDescriptionResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetIotHubDescription method.

Docs.summary:
Exports all the device identities in the IoT hub identity registry to an Azure Storage blob container. For more information, see: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-identity-registry#import-and-export-device-identities.
Request Path/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Devices/IotHubs/{resourceName}/exportDevices
Operation IdIotHubResource_ExportDevices
